    pfs="Standard"
>
[Black Lotus Extract](/Equipment.aspx?ID=107)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Virulent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=162" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 551 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Black lotus extract causes severe internal bleeding.

**Saving Throw** DC 42 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 15d6 poison damage and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 round); **Stage 2** 17d6 poison damage and drained 1 (1 round); **Stage 3** 20d6 poison damage and drained 2 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
